item.title: Viu TV 3
item.link: https://nowtv100-i.akamaihd.net/hls/live/229941/live1/master.m3u8|X-Forwarded-For=58.96.179.7&User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (iPad; CPU OS 6_0 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/536.26 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/6.0 Mobile/10A5376e Safari/8536.25&Referer=http://www.viu.tv/ch/99

regex.name: token
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re import requests
url = 'http://iview.abc.net.au/auth/flash/' source = requests.get(url) m3u8 = re.findall('tokenhd>(.*?)</tokenhd', source.text)[0] return m3u8
